Company: The Variable Annuity Life Insurance Company
Description of incident: Variable Annuity Life Insurance Company has announced a breach that occurred in 2007. The company just discovered the breach in November of 2013. The discovery led to a previous employee of the company in possession of information relating to some of their customers.  The information included customer names and either partial or complete Social Security numbers. The company has stated that they know of no unusual activity involving the stolen files but have set up identity protection services for one year for the affected parties.Call 1-713-831-6316 with questions.
